entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for July 10, 2024

summary.caption: “It’s worse than I first suspected, Mr. Binkley—you don’t even have a funny bone.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for July 10, 2024
The Far Side comic 3 for July 10, 2024

summary.caption: “Well, I suppose you’re all wondering why I’ve asked you here today. … Ha! I’ve always wanted to say that.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for July 10, 2024

summary.caption: “Wait just a gol dang minute here! He’s been dealin’ from the bottom of the deck, Jake! My pappy always said, ‘Never trust a grizzly.’”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for July 10, 2024

summary.caption: “Remember, milk, eggs, loaf of bread … and pick up one of those No-Penguin-Strips.”
